com.example.kit

Class CarouselImageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CarouselImageViewHolder>
      • com.example.kit.CarouselImageAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CarouselImageViewHolder.OnDeleteImageListener

    public class CarouselImageAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<CarouselImageViewHolder>
implements CarouselImageViewHolder.OnDeleteImageListener
    An implementation of a RecyclerView Adapter to manage displaying CarouselImages for an Item. Relays a CarouselImageViewHolder.OnAddImageListener to its ViewHolders. Can toggle between an Edit or Display mode, which toggles delete and add buttons within the list.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter

        androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter.StateRestorationPolicy
